name: Kalki- The Beginning of New Era
name_original: Kalki- The Beginning of New Era
description:
Game developed for GameJam event under Elan nVision, the prestigious tech fest of IIT-H by Team Ancient India Games.

The game portrays the JOURNEY of Kalki, the 11th avatar of Vishnu who is destined to take birth in Kaliyug or the dark age. 

Fulfilling the theme of JOURNEY as the game portrays the adventurous journey of Kalki in an Action-Role Playing Game style.

In game control use number key  & 2 to swap between weapons of bow and sword. Use Alt F4 to quit the game as due to time constraints we couldn't add a pause menu. Use E to mount the elephant.

Since the deadline was tight we could not fix all the bugs and optimize the game so you can expect some bugs and low fps if playing on low spec PC. We highly recommend to play on a high end PC for a smooth experince ;p.

Note- The elephant caught some bugs but it can still attack your enemies :D.
